title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 461.6 - Reimbursement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 461.6 - Reimbursement

State Regulations

Expenditures made by a social services district for
home-delivered meals pursuant to this Part shall be subject to reimbursement at
the rate of 50 per centum of its expenditures after first deducting therefrom
any Federal funds received or to be received on account thereof, and any
expenditures defrayed by private contributions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
461.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
